pkgmetadata.longdescription: > Write by lyc at 2021-7-6 > 项目地址：[tools-lyc7456 Gitee](https://gitee.com/lyc7456/tools-lyc7456) # tools-lyc7456lyc7456 运维开发小工具。```bash$ pip install --upgrade tools-lyc7456```## 目录说明```bashtools-lyc7456├── README.md # 项目说明├── CHANGELOG.md # 更新记录├── LICENSE├── pyproject.toml├── setup.py # 构建主文件│ ├── src # 源码目录└────── tests # 单元测试目录```## 打包与发布 Pypi> 发布参考：[Python包发布到Pypi](https://www.lyc7456.com/python/20210706145324.html) ```bash# 打包$ python -m build#发布 Pypi$ python -m twine upload --repository pypi dist/*```
